subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees completed a sweep of the Royals as Rodriguez pushed his career total to 1,995 R.B.I., putting him ahead of Babe Ruth (according to baseball’s official statisticians) and Lou Gehrig.
snippet: The Yankees completed a sweep of the Royals as Rodriguez pushed his career total to 1,995 R.B.I., putting him ahead of Babe Ruth (according to baseball’s official statisticians) and Lou Gehrig.
